    private class PatternGridView.CellTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to keep track of the pattern drawn so far

      • addCell

        public boolean addCell(int cellNumber)
        Add a cell to the current path.
        Parameters:
        cellNumber - cell number to be added (PatternGridView.getCellNumberFromRowAndColumn(int, int) can be used)
        Returns:
        false if it's already present or the cell number is invalid, true otherwise

      • setPath

        public void setPath(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Sets the path to be drawn on the canvas, according to the pattern entered so far. The direction arrows(Triangles) are also drawn.
        Parameters:
        canvas - upon which the direction arrows should be drawn
